entry.title: igz0/skyclad
entry.summary:
An experimental ATP/Bluesky client app for iOS and Android by Flutter.

Skyclad

Skyclad is an experimental ATP/Bluesky client app for iOS and Android by Flutter.

Installation

iOS: TestFlight
Android: Download APK

Screenshots

English is also supported!!

Features

✅ Login
✅ Home feed (Timeline)
✅ Notifications feed
✅ Author feed (Profile viewer)
✅ Like / Repost
✅ Send Post / Reply
✅ Upload an image
✅ Image preview
✅ Follow / Unfollow user
✅ i18n support (en-US / ja-JP)

Getting Started

For help getting started with Flutter, view the official documentation.

$ git clone git@github.com:igz0/skyclad.git
$ cd skyclad
$ flutter run

Notes

I'm developing this app in my free time, so I appreciate feedback and welcome PRs!
